label: id
comment: The unique identifier of this conformity attestation

domainIncludes.comment: A conformity attestation issued by a competent body that defines one or more assessments (eg carbon intensity) about a product (eg batttery) against a specification (eg LCA method) defined in a standard or regulation.
A formal governance scheme under which this attestation is issued (eg ACRS structural steel certification)
A standard (eg ISO 14000) or regulation (eg EU deforestation regulation) that specifies the criteria for conformance.
A specific rule or criterion within a standard or regulation. eg a carbon intensity calculation rule within an emissions standard.
A party in the conformity domain such as the manufacturer, assessment body, standards authority, accreditation authority, etc
